mapper.insert: insert into board_reply (repno, bno, content, writer_id, parent_id) values(reply_no_seq.nextval, #{bno}, #{content}, #{writer_id}, #{parent_id, jdbcType=NUMERIC})
mapper.update: update board_reply set del_chk = 'Y' where repno = #{repno}
mapper.select: select repno, bno, content, del_chk, case when TO_CHAR(SYSDATE ,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') < to_char(regdate + 1/(24*60), 'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') then to_char(TRUNC(((SYSDATE - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'))*24*60*60)))||'초전' when TO_CHAR(SYSDATE ,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi') < to_char(regdate + 1/24, 'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi') then to_char(TRUNC(((SYSDATE - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'))*24*60)))||'분전' when TO_CHAR(SYSDATE ,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24') < to_char(regdate + 1, 'yyyy/mm/dd hh24') then to_char(TRUNC(((SYSDATE - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24'))*24)))||'시간전' when TO_CHAR(SYSDATE ,'yyyy/mm/dd') < to_char(regdate + 7, 'yyyy/mm/dd') then to_char(TRUNC(((SYSDATE - TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD')))))||'일전' else to_char(regdate, 'yyyy"년"MM"월"dd"일"') end regdate , writer_id, parent_id from (select rownum rn, b.* from board_reply b join (select user_no, id from member) m on b.writer_id = m.user_no start with parent_id = 0 connect by prior repno = parent_id order siblings by repno asc) r where r.bno = #{bno}
